$listeners.desc: All native events are being propagated (you don't need the '.native' modifier)

color.desc: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette

size.desc: Size in CSS units, including unit name, for Spinner (unless using the default slot)

dark.desc: Notify the component that the background is a dark color

default.desc: Default slot is used for replacing default Spinner; Suggestions: a spinner or text
